name: Laundry Day (Lordofcheese)
description:
Controls

Move - WASD

Start Game - Space

This is a small chaotic game about a racoon that needs to bring all of his dirty laundry in the washing machine.

It was made during the Mini Jam 100, with the limitation of: "Chaos is everything".

Programming and a bit of art by https://lordofcheese.itch.io/

Most of the art by https://itch.io/profile/id-x

Music by https://errorball.itch.io/
